Guidelines: Each entity (person, publication, institution, event) should correspond to only one row in one table
A pair of entity can have several distinct relationships (e.g. one person working at the same institution at different times or at different posititons)

The name of a entity (person, publication, etc.) shoud be spelled consistently across the tables (be careful with whitespaces, comma, special signs, etc.)
Copy-Pasting the names can help be consistent.
If there are several values in the same cell, use the same sign as a separator of values across all the tables (semicolon are typically used, like this: artist; diplomat; writer""
